mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_NAME = #{userName}, USER_PWD = #{userPwd}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE = #{phone}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE FILE_TYPE = '3' AND REF_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE FILE_TYPE = '3' AND REF_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, ENROLL_DATE, STATUS, CREW_NO, BOARD_COUNT, USER_NO) VALUES(BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, '크루게시판', #{b.boardTitle}, #{b.boardContent}, SYSDATE, 'Y', #{crewId}, 0, #{userNo})
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT VALUES(SEQ_ATT_NO.NEXTVAL, 0, #{at.upload_Name}, #{at.origin_Name}, #{at.file_size}, #{at.file_Ext}, SYSDATE, 5, BOARD_NO.CURRVAL)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = '크루게시판' AND CREW_NO = #{crewId}

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, ENROLL_DATE, C.CREW_NAME, B.BOARD_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN CREW C ON (B.CREW_NO = C.CREW_ID) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = '크루게시판' AND STATUS = 'Y' AND CREW_NO = #{crewId} ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT * FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M USING(USER_NO) LEFT JOIN COMENT C ON (B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO) LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (A.REF_NO = B.BOARD_NO) WHERE B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.BOARD_TYPE= '크루게시판' ORDER BY C.COMENT_DATE DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, M.USER_NAME, B.ENROLL_DATE, B.BOARD_COUNT, M.USER_NO, B.CREW_NO FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) WHERE B.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND B.BOARD_TYPE = '크루모집'
SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, M.USER_NAME, B.ENROLL_DATE, B.BOARD_COUNT, B.CREW_NO FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) WHERE B.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND B.BOARD_TYPE = '크루게시판'
SELECT C.COMENT_NO, C.COMENT_CONTENT, C.COMENT_DATE, B.BOARD_TYPE, B.BOARD_TITLE FROM COMENT C LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON (B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO) WHERE C.USER_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, M.USER_NAME, B.ENROLL_DATE, B.CONTACT_STATUS FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) WHERE B.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND B.BOARD_TYPE = '문의'

SELECT * FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M USING(USER_NO) LEFT JOIN COMENT C ON (B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO) LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (A.REF_NO = B.BOARD_NO) WHERE B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.BOARD_TYPE= '문의' ORDER BY C.COMENT_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE FILE_TYPE = '4' AND FILE_NO = 0) A ON (B.BOARD_NO = A.REF_NO) JOIN CREW C ON (B.CREW_NO = C.CREW_ID) WHERE B.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND BOARD_TYPE = '크루모집'

SELECT C.CREW_NAME, C.CREW_ID, M.USER_ID, BA.BOARD_NO, BA.BOARD_TYPE, BA.CREW_NO, BA.UPLOAD_NAME, BA.REF_NO FROM CREW C JOIN INCREW IC ON(C.CREW_ID = IC.CREW_ID) JOIN MEMBER M ON (C.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) JOIN (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE, CREW_NO, UPLOAD_NAME, REF_NO FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN (SELECT UPLOAD_NAME, REF_NO FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE FILE_TYPE = '4' AND FILE_NO = 0) A ON (B.BOARD_NO = A.REF_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = '크루모집') BA ON (BA.CREW_NO = C.CREW_ID) WHERE IC.USER_NO = (SELECT USER_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}) AND IC.INCREW_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY C.CREW_ID ASC

SELECT M.USER_ID, M.USER_NAME, CREW_ID, CREW_NAME, IC.USER_NO, CATEGORY_NAME FROM CREW C JOIN INCREW IC USING (CREW_ID) JOIN MEMBER M ON(IC.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) JOIN CATEGORY CA ON (C.CATEGORY_NO = CA.CATEGORY_NO) WHERE C.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND IC.INCREW_STATUS = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMENT VALUES(SEQ_COMENT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{reply}, SYSDATE, NULL, 'Y', #{boardNo}, #{userNo}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT J.USER_NO, F.FACILITY_NO, F.PASS_COUNT, F.FACILITY_NAME, F.FACILITY_AREA, F.FACILITY_SECTION, F.FACILITY_ADDRESS, F.FACILITY_EVENT, A.UPLOAD_NAME FROM FACILITY F LEFT JOIN JJIM J ON (F.FACILITY_NO = J.FACILITY_NO) LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (A.REF_NO = F.FACILITY_NO) WHERE J.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND A.FILE_NO = 0 AND A.FILE_TYPE = '6'

SELECT M.USER_ID, CM.CREW_ID, CM.USER_NO, CM.CREW_NAME, CM.UPLOAD_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN (SELECT IC.CREW_ID, IC.USER_NO, C.CREW_NAME, BA.UPLOAD_NAME FROM INCREW IC JOIN CREW C ON (IC.CREW_ID = C.CREW_ID) JOIN (SELECT B.USER_NO, B.BOARD_NO, B.CREW_NO, A.UPLOAD_NAME, A.REF_NO FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN (SELECT UPLOAD_NAME, REF_NO FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE FILE_TYPE = '4' AND FILE_NO = 0) A ON (B.BOARD_NO = A.REF_NO) JOIN CREW C ON (B.CREW_NO = C.CREW_ID) WHERE B.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND BOARD_TYPE = '크루모집' ) BA ON (BA.CREW_NO = C.CREW_ID)) CM ON (M.USER_NO = CM.USER_NO) WHERE CM.CREW_ID = #{crewId}

SELECT ROWNUM, PR.PP_COUNT, TO_CHAR(PR.PP_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS PP_DATE, PR.PP_STATUS, F.FACILITY_NO, F.FACILITY_NAME FROM PASSRECORD PR JOIN FACILITY F ON (PR.FACILITY_NO = F.FACILITY_NO) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND PR.PP_DATE BETWEEN '#{date1}' AND '#{date2}' AND PR.PP_STATUS = 2
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE, STATUS = 'N' WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PASSRECORD VALUES(SEQ_PP_NO.NEXTVAL, 1, SYSDATE, #{deductPass}, SEQ_PAY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{facilityNo}, #{useCode}, #{userNo})
mapper.select: SELECT P.PASS_COUNT, PR.USE_CODE, F.FACILITY_NAME, F.PASS_COUNT AS FACILITY_PASS FROM PASSRECORD PR JOIN PASS P ON (PR.USER_NO = P.USER_NO) JOIN (SELECT FACILITY_NAME, PASS_COUNT, FACILITY_NO FROM FACILITY WHERE FACILITY_NO = #{facilityNo}) F USING(FACILITY_NO) WHERE PR.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND USE_CODE IS NOT NULL

SELECT ROWNUM, TO_CHAR(PR.PP_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS PP_DATE, PR.USE_CODE, F.FACILITY_NAME, PP_STATUS FROM PASSRECORD PR JOIN FACILITY F USING(FACILITY_NO) WHERE PP_STATUS = 0 OR PP_STATUS = 3 AND PR.USER_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT BOARD_NO FROM BOARD WHERE CREW_NO = #{crewId} AND BOARD_TYPE = '크루모집'
SELECT ROWNUM, PRICE, TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS PAY_DATE, PROOF_NO, REFUND_NO, PASS_PLUS FROM PAYMENT WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND PAY_DATE BETWEEN '#{date1}' AND '#{date2}'
